did.unittitle: Vollinger, William . The Child in the Hole (B-flat Clarinet Score)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pieces included: 1 score, 1 CD. Notes: submission letter housed with Christ and his bride… The CD and a duplicate of the score were in a manila envelope on which was written "Kentucky New Music Festival, Sop/Mz-sop submissions." Note on envelope: VW1.1 .02, VW1.2 .07, VW1.3 .06.
